summary: After you install these setting, your web browser will redirect old link to the proper URL.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#ffff00][size=6]Redirect Old Broken Links
[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3]This is not a mod. It is a URL setting for Redirector(web browser extension).
After you install these setting, your web browser will redirect old link to the proper URL.
[/size]
[line][/center]
[color=#ffff00][b][size=5]What does it do?
[/size]
[/b][/color][size=3]Redirect 4 types of links:

[/size][size=3][b][color=#ff7700]- Old Creation Kit Links[/color][/b]
[u]Example[/u]: [color=#a4c2f4]http://www.creationkit.com/Category:Papyrus[/color] → [color=#a4c2f4]http://www.creationkit.com/index.php?title=Category:Papyrus[/color]

[b][color=#ff7700]- Old Skyrim Nexus Mod Links [/color][color=#00ff00](Nexus fixed it already.)[/color][/b]
[u]Example[/u]: [color=#a4c2f4]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32057[/color] → [color=#a4c2f4]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32057[/color]

[b][color=#ff7700]- Old Oblivion Nexus Mod Links[/color][/b]
[u]Example[/u]: [color=#a4c2f4]http://tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=27797[/color] → [color=#a4c2f4]http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/27797/[/color]

[b][color=#ff7700]- Nexus Mods AJAX Description[/color][/b]
[u]Example[/u]: [color=#a4c2f4]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/ajax/moddescription/?pUp=1&id=48477[/color] 
→ [color=#a4c2f4]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48477[/color][/size]

[line]
[color=#ffff00][size=5][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]
1. Install Redirector ( [url=https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/redirector/ocgpenflpmgnfapjedencafcfakcekcd?hl=en]Chrome[/url] | [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/en-Gb/firefox/addon/redirector/]Firefox[/url] )
2. Download the main file and unpack it.
3. Open Redirector > Click Edit Redirects > Import [color=#00ffff]Redirect Old Broken Links.json[/color] file. 
4. Done.[/size]

[line]
[color=#ffff00][size=5][b]Credit 
[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]These settings are created by [url=https://www.reddit.com/user/crazysnailboy]crazysnailboy[/url]. 
Original post: [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/5ydz9a/redirect_old_creation_kit_links/]https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/5ydz9a/redirect_old_creation_kit_links/  
[/url][/size]
author: crazysnailboy
